snippet: Councilman Fernando Cabrera said the redevelopment would worsen traffic and parking problems in his district. He had supported the plan as recently as last month.
abstract: Redevelopment of Kingsbridge Armory in the Bronx into a national ice center remains uncertain after New York City Councilman Fernando Cabrera says it would worsen traffic and parking problems in his district.
lead_paragraph: Councilman Fernando Cabrera said the redevelopment would worsen traffic and parking problems in his district. He had supported the plan as recently as last month.

headline.main: Bronx Councilman Withdraws Support for Armory Ice Center
headline.print_headline: Bronx Councilman Reverses on Armory Ice Center Proposal
